screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .vtofu file in VTofu
screenshot.caption: VTOFU file open in VTofu

description: In VTofu, users move their mouse and click to move a virtual tofu block. From VTofu's menu, users can apply a color or image to VTofu's tofu block and/or background. Users can then click the Save button to save these settings in a VTOFU file. This allows them to load their tofu and background settings back into VTofu at a later time.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .vtofu file in VTofu
images.caption: VTOFU file open in VTofu
